TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBindingValueUIHandler extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a UI handler for data binding values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingValueUIHandler"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnGetUIValueItem (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor propDesc, System.Collections.ArrayList valueUIItemList);

.method public hidebysig instance void OnGetUIValueItem(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor propDesc, class System.Collections.ArrayList valueUIItemList) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> object that can provide additional context information.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> that represents the property to add a data binding for.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList"> of items that have data bindings.
Docs.summary: Adds a data binding for the specified property and the specified value item list, if the current control has data bindings and the current object does not already have a binding.
